function lrt_select_row( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type
                       , o_rt_lrt   out lm_lifesign_req_sent%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lrt ( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_lifesign_req_sent lrt
            where lrt.id = i_lrt_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_lrt( i_lrt_id => i_lrt_id );
         fetch c_lrt into o_rt_lrt;
         l_found := c_lrt%found;
         close c_lrt;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lrt%isopen
         then
            close c_lrt;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_select_row;

return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_lrt ( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_lifesign_req_sent lrt
            where lrt.id = i_lrt_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_lrt( i_lrt_id => i_lrt_id );
   fetch c_lrt into o_rt_lrt;
   l_found := c_lrt%found;
   close c_lrt;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_lrt%isopen
      then
         close c_lrt;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end lrt_select_row_upd;

procedure lrt_lock_row( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_lrt ( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_lifesign_req_sent lrt
              where lrt.id = i_lrt_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_lrt_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                lrt_lock_row_nowait( i_lrt_id => i_lrt_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_lrt( i_lrt_id => i_lrt_id );
                  close c_lrt;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_lrt%isopen
         then
            close c_lrt;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_lock_row;

procedure lrt_lock_row_nowait( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_lrt ( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_lifesign_req_sent lrt
               where lrt.id = i_lrt_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_lrt_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_lrt( i_lrt_id => i_lrt_id );

            close c_lrt;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_lrt%isopen
        then
           close c_lrt;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lrt_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_lock_row_nowait;

procedure lrt_insert_row ( io_rt_lrt  in out lm_lifesign_req_sent%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_lifesign_req_sent( id
                                , lpy_id
                                , sequence
                                , event_time
                                , response_received
                                , event_time_response )
              values ( io_rt_lrt.id
                     , io_rt_lrt.lpy_id
                     , io_rt_lrt.sequence
                     , io_rt_lrt.event_time
                     , io_rt_lrt.response_received
                     , io_rt_lrt.event_time_response )
           returning id
                   , lpy_id
                   , sequence
                   , event_time
                   , response_received
                   , event_time_response
                into io_rt_lrt.id
                   , io_rt_lrt.lpy_id
                   , io_rt_lrt.sequence
                   , io_rt_lrt.event_time
                   , io_rt_lrt.response_received
                   , io_rt_lrt.event_time_response;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LPY_ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.lpy_id||'"'
                                                             ||', SEQUENCE = "'||io_rt_lrt.sequence||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', RESPONSE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_lrt.response_received||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME_RESPONSE = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time_response||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_insert_row;

function lrt_perform_update( i_lrt_id   in     lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type
                           , io_rt_lrt  in out lm_lifesign_req_sent%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_lifesign_req_sent
            set id = io_rt_lrt.id
              , lpy_id = io_rt_lrt.lpy_id
              , sequence = io_rt_lrt.sequence
              , event_time = io_rt_lrt.event_time
              , response_received = io_rt_lrt.response_received
              , event_time_response = io_rt_lrt.event_time_response
          where id = i_lrt_id
      returning id
              , lpy_id
              , sequence
              , event_time
              , response_received
              , event_time_response
           into io_rt_lrt.id
              , io_rt_lrt.lpy_id
              , io_rt_lrt.sequence
              , io_rt_lrt.event_time
              , io_rt_lrt.response_received
              , io_rt_lrt.event_time_response;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.id||'"'
                                                             ||', LPY_ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.lpy_id||'"'
                                                             ||', SEQUENCE = "'||io_rt_lrt.sequence||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time||'"'
                                                             ||', RESPONSE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_lrt.response_received||'"'
                                                             ||', EVENT_TIME_RESPONSE = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time_response||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_perform_update;

function lrt_perform_delete( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_lifesign_req_sent
          where id = i_lrt_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lrt_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_perform_delete;

function lrt_update_row( i_lrt_id   in     lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type
                       , io_rt_lrt  in out lm_lifesign_req_sent%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lrt_lock_row( i_lrt_id   =>  i_lrt_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            lrt_perform_update( i_lrt_id   =>  i_lrt_id
                              , io_rt_lrt  => io_rt_lrt );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.id||'"'
                                                          ||', LPY_ID = "'||io_rt_lrt.lpy_id||'"'
                                                          ||', SEQUENCE = "'||io_rt_lrt.sequence||'"'
                                                          ||', EVENT_TIME = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time||'"'
                                                          ||', RESPONSE_RECEIVED = "'||io_rt_lrt.response_received||'"'
                                                          ||', EVENT_TIME_RESPONSE = "'||io_rt_lrt.event_time_response||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end lrt_update_row;

function lrt_delete_row( i_lrt_id   in  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         lrt_lock_row( i_lrt_id   =>  i_lrt_id );

         
         l_deleted := lrt_perform_delete( i_lrt_id   =>  i_lrt_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_lrt_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_delete_row;

function lrt_seq1_nextval
return lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.lrt_seq1_nextval';
   l_lrt_id  lm_lifesign_req_sent.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_lrt_seq1.nextval 
           into l_lrt_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_lrt_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end lrt_seq1_nextval;


end lm_lrt_tapi_pck;
